wikipedia_page.main: Professor Sidney William Wooldridge CBE, FRS, FGS (16 November 1900 – 25 April 1963), geologist, geomorphologist and geographer, was a pioneer in the study of the geomorphology of south-east England and the first professor of geography at King's College London. He collaborated with Dudley Stamp and with David Linton.

response: *Sidney William Wooldridge (1900–1963), English geologist and physical geographer
* Prof Sidney William Wooldridge , the first Professor of Geography at King's College London (KCL) in 1944

response: *Sidney William Wooldridge, Professor of Geography, University of London. For services to the Ministry of Housing & Local Government.
